ovdesc.p: The table or its GUI version will be used to start the SOD and EOD services.

desc.p: Used for internal purpose. Using this value a specific service can be started.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide to the user a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
Indicates which service to be started. Drop down list from TSA.SERVICE table.
1. Service should be avaialable in TSA.SERVICE list.
2. Not Allowed to start if service already Start.
